## Paquetes


```{r}
library(rgrass7)
```

## Región de GRASS

```{r}
gisdbase <- 'grassdata'
wd <- getwd()
loc <- initGRASS(gisBase = "/usr/lib/grass78/",
                 home = wd, 
                 gisDbase = paste(wd, gisdbase, sep = '/'),
                 location = 'data',
                 mapset = "PERMANENT",
                 override = TRUE)
```
